content: AMAZING game!! Please make another ASAP! Thank you!
More levels please!
Great game! Very unique and the graphics and music were wonderful. Highly recommend.

Beautiful game, and the puzzles are fun and well thought-out. Basically, flawless. There is one minor kvetch. When the puzzle gets into an unwinnable state, the game immediately, obtrusively points that out. Don't do this. Either don’t have unwinnable states, or have the confidence to let the player struggle with it. Or stick it in a setting if you must. A notice of a misstep comes off as irksome and nagging. Still, well worth the price of admission and I look forward to more from this studio
beautiful

The game is fairly short and isn't very challenging. What makes it good is a perfect difficulty curve that always keeps you engaged while never frustrating you and the soothing atmosphere which for me made for a very relaxing experience. The game is also very polished and each of the characters has its own personality highlighting the main mechanic being that the characters need eachother to make it to the end. Definitely not a hardcore puzzler but a good time nonetheless.
Excellent
Awesome game! Great graffics, engaging puzzles.

Adorable and challenging. Two words to sum up my thoughts on this game. I love their little voices and animations as they converse and scramble over one another to reach their goals. I could write much more but instead, I'll just suggest that you not hesitate in playing this little gem of a puzzler.

Good but Id really prefer the apo not to force fullscreen. I have it turned off cause putting screen space where the bezel should be has always been a dumb smartphone idea. I knocked two stars off for forcing me to look at my stupid camera slot. Fix this and it's 5 stars.
Fun challenge
AAA mobile game. Very good. Will update once win.
So cute and cute with lots of surprises!
This is a great game. I really like the characters and everything. XD The devs are nice too and I look forward to seeing what they do in the future. ❤️
Charming puzzle game. The explorers have a lot of character. The puzzles are fun without being too difficult.

My family and I really enjoyed this fun pathfinding puzzler. The game is fairly short but beautiful and very satisfying. They've added on a few extra (and free!) holiday themed levels that aren't quite as polished as the core game, but are definitely still a welcome addition. I can't wait to see what else this dev team comes up with!

Nice little game, shades of Monument Valley in the look and feel of the environment, but here you're manipulating three characters in a set order to navigate and solve a set of puzzles. If you go wrong, you can undo your moves. Unlike MV the environment is the same at all levels, and, although there are coins to collect it was never clear what they were for, but perhaps I missed something. No glitches, ads, killing or time pressure, so full marks to the devs for a pleasant experience.

A Great puzzle game, had a lot of fun with it! Gameplay is using three archeologist with three different colors (changable colors and colorblind mode in options I might add) with semi secret coins in breakable vases. Using the three to boost up or down to reach triggers, switches, moving platforms and much more to reach exits and a connector puzzle. Worth the price as theres more levels and ending if all coins collected and a Christmas mode, fun achievements, and plenty challenging. Support Devs
Very enjoyable puzzle game. Great graphics
Loved the game! The characters are adorable and the puzzles were creative.
Excellent game
Great concept, really enjoyable game. Progressive Logic.

The main story is pretty short I played through the game in about an hour or so including the festival levels. The game does a good job with making it not to difficult but not outrageously hard either. The graphics are amazing and I love the designs of the adventures it's adorable. The only problem I had was playing on a phone (pixel 3 xl) I would mistap occasionally and had to zoom in to make sure I was hitting the right spot. On a tablet though I don't think it would be noticable.

Excellent, challenging and beautiful. A very fun adventure puzzle game with physics elements which stimulate the brain in all the best ways while being very fun to solve. Thank you so much for creating such a gorgeous and engaging game.

Highly recommend. 1. High level of polish. The game's art assets, animations, pathfinding, puzzle design, everything, is very well done. I never once encountered any issues in the game itself. 2. Solid puzzles. The base game's puzzles aren't over-the-top difficult, though I am still working through Winterfest which seems quite a bit more challenging. Each puzzle is clean and varied when compared to previous puzzles. 3. Cute characters. Though the characters rarely speak, they have plenty of personality which shines through mostly in their animations.
Fun puzzle game with cute graphics. Worth it & I cant wait to see more from this developer
I enjoyed it a lot, thanks!

Fun offline game with some challenging puzzles and no ads or microtransactions, but a bit short. An indication of how many moves it took to complete a puzzle vs the minimum moves necessary would give some replay value.
I love this game! I played the demo at MAGFest and the full version is fantastic. Highly recommended for anyone who enjoys puzzlers.

I tried this game at Magfest 2020 and immediately picked it up on my phone! The art is well polished and the puzzles are satisfying to complete. The developers effectively increased the difficulty gradually as I progressed through the game!
Love this game 😍 keep improving it and adding more levels with new environments ,👍👍👍👍

Just started playing but as a colorblind person I just want to say thank you for giving the option to change the character's colors! It's so refreshing to see a game developer consider that in their game. Lovely game so far.
replyContent:
We're happy to hear our colorblind features worked out for you! Thank you for the feedback.
- Andrew

content: A really good puzzle game which makes very inventive use of the game mechanics. Very happy to buy a good puzzle game, rather than something cursed with infuriating in game currencies, ads and continual up-sell. An easy 5 stars.
This is so cool that I paid for no ads! It kinda reminded me of Monument Valley. The graphics are great! It really makes you think, I thoroughly enjoyed it. I hope more levels come soon!
Great puzzles
Thiz a cool game it made me think a little the only downside i seen was it was to short it seemed like i just started to get into it and all the levels were done
Fantastic indie puzzle game! Very easy to get into and the difficulty ramps up nicely. Very polished look and feel. Great first game!

Similar to Lost Vikings without the real time action. Relaxed play. U move 3 characters around to switches, lifts, blocks & also smash pots for treasure, like Lara croft go. Pleasing graphics & simple controls. Puzzles r generally good. The door lock puzzles could do with more variety & the dlc ones let the game down. I used to design & playtest level design. The dlc ones feel hurried. Too many leave u stuck to back track or restart. A player should always have a way out. Main game 4 🌟 dlc 2🌟
Fun and challenging for all ages. I have a 5 and 7 year old. Keeps them engaged and focused. With a little help they seem to get the idea
If you like puzzles this game won't disappoint. I hope they come out with more levels!
This game is beautiful and serene. Picked it up after Seatte Indies Expo and loved it!
Beautiful graphics and animations, puzzles are super fun too. Found this game through your reddit post, wish you guys a bunch of success!

Saw this at Dreamhack 2019 and knew i had to buy it. What first drew me in was how simplistic and colorful the design is. It isn't flashy and is very mellow. The levels become increasingly difficult and you must use skills you learned previously to solve the current puzzle. They even have the option of changing the three characters colors to better suit your visual needs. As a female gamer that plays all sorts of genres, I've really missed the puzzle games. Thanks for making this addictive game!
Absolutely Fantastic!
Fantastic game, the super clean and amazing art and music and sounds really bring this up above other similar games. Definitely recommend!
Fantastic game. Very well polished, overall great experience. Easy to pick up and put down when you have a spare minute.
Amazing puzzle game. Creative, and not punishingly difficult.
Very good game, just wish there were more levels
replyContent: Hello there! Your wish has been granted. Update your game for four new holiday themed levels!

content: Overall an awesome game that will keep you entertained for several hours, well worth the money!
Super super cute. Got to see the game at SIX and liked it so I got it :)
Such a wonderful puzzle game! Can recommend it to anyone who's into playing puzzle games.

Brilliant! Anyone who loves puzzle games - especially like the old 'push the boxes around' - will love this - the characters are cute and the levels not too easy but not too difficult either - next levels soonest please!
Great puzzle game! Really makes you think. Love the graphics. Each level is progressively harder and adds new elements. No ads, worth the price!

Awesome! The game play is absolutely perfect, the little guys quickly go exactly where you tell them to or adorably shake their heads to signify they can't. Love the backgrounds, music, and character chatter, which all help make the game world so serene and mystical. The extra settings like being able to change the char colours are thoughtful and helpful. Also a big fan of the instant memo when you get stuck, rather than letting you struggle. Excited to see more games by this team in the future!
Awesome game! I love puzzle games, the music is beautiful and the characters are cute and creative. I would love to see more levels and harder difficulty puzzles.
Good game but far too short. Finished it in a couple of hours!
replyContent: Hi Martin, thanks for the feedback! We just finished putting out 4 new levels for the holidays. Sorry for the delay, being a team of 2 it just takes us a bit longer to get them out in the world!

content: My new favourite! Ticks all the boxes - thanks for the great experience, please keep similar games coming!

Really fun and well put together game! The puzzles are engaging and the design of the whole game is very appealing, the music and sound design complements the game perfectly. Got me hooked right away! Highly recommend!

An aesthetically pleasing puzzle adventure where you follow three funny little characters and help them navigate interesting puzzles. There's some surprising challenge. It combines the mechanics found in other puzzle games but provides an interesting twist. The atmosphere and theme are great as well. A spin on one of my favorite themes. The characters are adorable, the UI is clean and easy to use, and all around its a fun puzzle game. Refreshing to see an android game this well put together.
This is an adorable, brilliant, challenging puzzle game. The visuals are peaceful and animated. Love it! Andrew, you rock!!
This is a great game, with great developers and great people behind it. Played this before release at PAX West, and I was impressed.
An incredibly well-made puzzle game, absolutely worth the price tag.
Amazing gameplay and graphics! Perfect balance of fun and difficulty. Overall UX is great!
Sooooo coool! Worth more than what i paid!
